package.name: particle_filter_project
package.description: All the generated map (distance image, likelihood image, SLAM image) are directly in src folder # How to run: Create a ~/catkin_ws/src and put all the files into this folder. Modify the image path in likelihood_field_model.py to your path to image Specifically, this line: input_image = cv2.imread('map.png', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE) You may need to do chmod+x to give executable permision to python files You can see the output of the sampled motion model in terminal and visualization of senser model by plot package
